alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:01AM CDT until July 24 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT FOR THOMAS...NORTHERN LOGAN...SOUTHWESTERN SHERIDAN AND NORTHWESTERN GOVE COUNTIES... At 201 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Menlo to near Monument to 5 miles northwest of Winona, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Monument around 205 AM CDT. Winona around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Oakley, Grinnell and Russell Springs. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 36 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
